Interface WorkoutRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Workout,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Workout,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Workout,String>, org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<Workout,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Workout,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Workout>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Workout,String>
@Repository public interface WorkoutRepository extends org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<Workout,String>
Repository interface for managing Workout entities in MongoDB. Provides CRUD operations and custom query methods.

  • Method Details

    • findByUserId

      List<Workout> findByUserId(String userId)
      Finds all workouts by a specific user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      a list of workouts for the given user

    • findByWorkoutType

      List<Workout> findByWorkoutType(String workoutType)
      Finds all workouts of a specific type.
      Parameters:
      workoutType - the type of the workout (e.g., "cardio")
      Returns:
      a list of workouts matching the type

    • findByDateBetween

      List<Workout> findByDateBetween(Date startDate, Date endDate)
      Finds workouts that occurred between two dates.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the start date
      endDate - the end date
      Returns:
      a list of workouts between the specified dates

    • findByUserIdAndWorkoutType

      List<Workout> findByUserIdAndWorkoutType(String userId, String workoutType)
      Finds workouts for a user filtered by workout type.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID
      workoutType - the type of workout
      Returns:
      a list of workouts matching user and type

    • findTopByOrderByIdDesc

      List<Workout> findTopByOrderByIdDesc()
      Finds the most recently added workout based on descending ID order.
      Returns:
      the latest workout entry
